text: The Fokker Dr.I was a World War I fighter airplane. It was designed by Reinhold Platz and built by Fokker-Flugzeugwerke. The Dr.I was used only in small numbers and it had many problems. It is well known as the plane flown by the "Red Baron", Manfred von Richthofen. Category:World War I aircraft Category:Fokker aircraft Category:German military aircraft
title: Fokker Dr.I
